summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by restructuring `frontend/src/App.tsx` with React imported at the top and no imports after the default export. REQ-2 is not evidenced in the diff: no static image files were added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` even though the UI references those asset paths.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated static images under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the exact filenames referenced by the UI so the app renders without missing-asset errors.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows UI code referencing `/assets/generated/backpack-*.png`, but there are no added files under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (no files were added at all).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a footer attribution link to caffeine.ai in the app shell.
hallucinated_features.reason: This UI/attribution change is not requested by REQ-1 or REQ-2 (which focus on build success and adding missing static assets).
